results.name: A098414(n) - (A007529(n) + A098415(n))/2.
comment: (A007529(n),2*A098416(n)+a(n), A098415(n)) is a prime triple (p,q,r) with p<q<r=p+6.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Triplet
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 07 2004
